title: **NO FEE**4BR/2Bath near Harvard/Inman/Union Sqs
posting_body: Steps to the Inman sq Whole foods, Located on a quiet street, tons of Sun, All Large Bedrooms, 2 baths,  Modern eat-in Kitchen, Huge ( 8'x 30' ) rear Porch, Hardwood FLoors throughout, coin-op Laundry in the basement, walk to the new Union Sq Greenline or Harvard sq Redline in 10 minutes.
Pets Neg ( $35/month for a cat / $85 for dogs) off street Parking avail , Check out a 3D video w/ Floor plans for this apt at :
Avail 9/1/22, rent is $4200 /month  plus Utilities , ***No FEE!
rent directly from the owner, Call or text Dave at 617 212 5429,
